name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.warn.after.ms
description:
If looking up a single user to group takes longer than this amount of
    milliseconds, we will log a warning message.

name: dfs.domain.socket.disable.interval.seconds
description:
The interval that a DataNode is disabled for future Short-Circuit Reads,
    after an error happens during a Short-Circuit Read. Setting this to 0 will
    not disable Short-Circuit Reads at all after errors happen. Negative values
    are invalid.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.task.listener.thread-count
description:
The number of threads used to handle RPC calls in the
    MR AppMaster from remote tasks

name: fs.s3a.threads.max
description:
The total number of threads available in the filesystem for data
    uploads *or any other queued filesystem operation*.

name: dfs.client.server-defaults.validity.period.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds after which cached server defaults are updated.

    By default this parameter is set to 1 hour.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.
